alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:53PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pennington County through 645 PM MDT... At 553 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles southeast of New Underwood, or 22 miles east of Rapid City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Owanka around 610 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Scenic and Sheep Mountain Table. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 76 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
